TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
Kraken, the Kraken created the Kerbals, also known as the Big Kod Man or the Biggy K.

What is the speed of dark?

Spoiler

Yay! New page!

When a photon passes, its light gets replaced by dark behind the photon.

Is the newtrino really new?

No. It is made by Apple and so is already obsolete and been replaced by Newtrino 20.

Is Apple a fan of Orange?

Yes, of a clockwork one.

As there are the orangeade, the lemonade, the appleade, and even the tomatoade, is there a cornade?

There is no cornade, there is only comrade.

*cue USSR anthem*

Is this a risk?

No this Thermonuclear War. How about a nice game of Tic Tac Toe Joshua?

Why start something new that will end up costing you thousands of dollars when what you have already is great?

Because of the money penguins.

 

If a bar of soap gets dirty does it clean itself?

Yes, being thrown into water.

How do they distinguish soap from soup?

After you take sip, if bubbles come out of your mouth then it is soap.

What is a money penguin?

It's a complementary complement to the pony moonguin.

Where is the Moon's moon?

On the darkside. It is mooning the rest of the galaxy.

Should Lego have a KSP parts pack so you can build your models in real life?

Yes, because it would be a true reusable rocket.

Why not use liquid oxygen for the fishtank aeration?

Because the fish would O.D.

Who wants to rule the world?

Yes. Doctor Who does it.

Who needs this world at all, even to rule it?

The people who make flat wooden sticks with little, regularly spaced, notches on them.

If you manage to rule the world, will it measure up?

No, because rulers aren't big enough.

Why does water not spill out of a half full cup?

Because you are rotating the rope too fast.

Why do they call "breakfast" the morning meal? What does it break and why do it fast?

It breaks your speed. When you wake up and realise you have slept in and need to rush out the door it forces you to stop and eat it, so that you are slowed down and even later.

Who has your measure?
How do i land

1 hour ago, Staticalliam7 said:

How do i land

Don't fly and stay out of the water.

How do I sea?

Dunk your head into the salt water.

How do I move someone to another area in a boat?

Jump out the back of the boat, then push boat where it needs to go.

Did the Large Hadron Collider create a Black Hole?

Yes. In budget.

Are the Large Hadrons bigger that a banana?

The orange flavoured Hadrons are bigger than the Banana flavoured ones.

What makes you happy?

Depends on the what.

Why do the English questions always start with "wh"? Why? Who? When? Where? What? Which? Whow is it possible?

Edited October 21, 2021 by kerbiloid
